ningov-spellpoints.form: Click the button to open Spell Points System 5e Configuration
ningov-spellpoints.form-hint: Here you can configure module behaviour, spell point cost and more.
ningov-spellpoints.resourceNote: This is the name of the resource on Player Character Sheet that represents the spell points (default: Spell Points).
ningov-spellpoints.mixedMode: With Mixed Mode enabled every character will get the option to enable Spell Points directly in the character sheet.
ningov-spellpoints.autoNote: Enable this settings if you want the module do the math for you every time a Player Character advance in a Class Level or gain a new Class
ningov-spellpoints.formulaNote: What formula should this module use to calculate the maximum PC spell points (default: DMG).
ningov-spellpoints.formulaNote2: Choosing Advanced Magic (homebrew), spell points will be calculated accordingly to the free homebrew module "Advanced Magic - Spell Points System 5e" available for free on
ningov-spellpoints.costLabel: Spell Points cost for Level {slotLevel} slots.
ningov-spellpoints.spellPointsCostsNote: You don't need to change the spell point costs if you are using the default spellpoint rules on DMG (page 288).
ningov-spellpoints.AMInstructions: This module allows you to customize spellpoints costs and enabling other options below not used with the default rules. You can find an alternate system available for free on
ningov-spellpoints.AMInstructions2: the options you see below are part of the rules explained in that module.
ningov-spellpoints.enableVariantLabel: Use HP as Spell Points (Gritty Variant)
ningov-spellpoints.enableVariantNote: Enabling this Player's Characters will be able to continue casting spell once they run out of spell points using their own life at increased cost (see Advanced Magic System)
ningov-spellpoints.spLifeCostNote: How many Hit Points Maximum a character will lose casting a spell with his own life. This is a multiplier. ex: if set to 2 a character casting a Spell with a cost of 2 spell points will lose 4 hp max. (default:2)
ningov-spellpoints.createNewResource: Please create a new resource named {SpellPoints}
ningov-spellpoints.castedLifeDead: {ActorName} casted using his last Hit Points Maximum reducing it to 0 and DIED permanently!
ningov-spellpoints.castedLife: {ActorName} casted using his own life losing {hpMaxLost} Maximum Hit Points
ningov-spellpoints.notEnoughSp: {ActorName} doesn't have enough {SpellPoints} to cast this spell.
ningov-spellpoints.pleaseCreate: Please create a resource named: '{SpellPoints}' to cast this spell.
ningov-spellpoints.youNotEnough: You don't have enough '{SpellPoints}' to cast this spell.
